meta.title: Doctor Mays' Birthday Quest
storyIntro: In a realm where knowledge is power and wisdom is the greatest treasure...
A great darkness known as the Shadow of Ignorance has begun to consume the land of Trivia.
The ancient Oracle speaks: 'Only a hero of wit and wisdom can push back the shadow.'
You must conquer the Trials of Knowledge to bring light back to the realm.
Each trial solved brings the kingdom closer to the Grand Celebration!
Your quest begins now, brave hero...

characters.name: Synth the Sage
characters.bio: An ancient scholar who channels knowledge through synthwave magic

characters.bio: A quick-witted thief who solves problems with style

characters.bio: A feline archer with supernatural perception

characters.name: Melody Rose
characters.bio: A rockstar whose music literally changes reality
